attributes.comment:
The Proposed Increase for the Immigration and Naturalization Petitions flies in the
face of the legislative intent of the Immigration System and the democratic ideals
established by our Forefathers. This proposed increase will in effect prejudice
those potential petitioners who most need the system to help them integrate with
the U.S. Society: that is, they simply will not be able to afford it. This will increase
the number of undocumented and possibly compel individuals to try to circumvent
the system itself because they have no other choice. Those that try to meet these
fees will more than likely be forced to abandon any idea of seaking legal help due
to the additional cost thereby making mistakes and filing inadequate petitions etc.
thereby further clogging the system's arteries. In my opinion such a request lacks
the common sense God gave a child.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Mark J. Russo, Law Office of Mark Russo
